name: Base Building
description: Build a proper survival base with shelter, storage, farms, and defenses

steps.instruction: Find a flat area near your spawn point for your base. Ideally near water, with trees nearby. Remember this location.
Build 4 walls using cobblestone or planks. The house should be at least 5x5x3 blocks (width x length x height). Leave a 1-block opening for the door.
Cover the top of your house with blocks to form a roof. Use slabs or full blocks.
Craft and place a wooden door in the opening. Place torches inside and outside the house to prevent mob spawning.
steps.done_when: door placed and house is lit

steps.instruction: Place a crafting_table, furnace, and chest inside your house. These are your basic work stations.
steps.done_when: crafting_table, furnace, and chest placed inside house

steps.instruction: Outside your house, create a small wheat farm: hoe dirt blocks near water to make farmland, plant wheat_seeds. A 4x4 farm with water in the center is ideal.
steps.done_when: farmland blocks with wheat seeds planted

steps.instruction: Build a fenced area near your base for animals. Use fence blocks to create a pen. Lure animals in using their preferred food (wheat for cows/sheep, seeds for chickens, carrots for pigs).
Place torches around the outside of your base in every direction, every 7 blocks. This prevents hostile mobs from spawning near your base.
